attributes.action: Put up CCTV cameras around Howard estate, including shops
attributes.additional_details: I would like it to be done to make others feel safe when our and about on the estate, especially children
attributes.background: I would like a decision to be made to put up CCTV cameras around the Howard estate in bury st Edmunds

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about installation of CCTV are a matter for individual landowners and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
